title: Still Jittery: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Nov. 25, 2025

title: Crypto Markets Today: Bitcoin Leads Rebound, Altcoins Rally During Longer-Term Downturn
contentSnippet: Bitcoin recaptured $87,000 on Tuesday as improving risk appetite and a strong equities session helped lift major altcoins.

title: Metaplanet borrows another $130 million against its bitcoin holdings to buy more BTC
contentSnippet: The company said its 30,823 BTC reserve provides ample collateral headroom under the $500 million facility, with $230 million now drawn.

title: ETF outflows and macro data keep traders guarded as bitcoin’s ‘gentle recovery’ extends: analysts
contentSnippet: Analysts say ETF flows, onchain stress and critical macro data keep risks elevated despite bitcoin's modest rebound.

title: Cameo Wins Temporary Restraining Order Against OpenAI
contentSnippet: A federal judge has temporarily blocked OpenAI from using "Cameo" or confusingly similar marks for its Sora AI video generation products.

title: Metaplanet Draws $130M for Further Bitcoin Acquisitions Under Credit Facility
contentSnippet: The Japanese company executed new borrowing as part of its expanding bitcoin focused funding strategy.

title: Grayscale and Franklin XRP ETFs each clock over $60 million in day-one inflows as group outshines BTC, ETH, and SOL funds
contentSnippet: The combined spot XRP ETFs registered $164 million worth of net inflows for the day, outperforming their BTC, ETH, and SOL counterparts.

title: Bitcoin Faces $13.3B Monthly Options Expiry as BTC Trades Well Below Max Pain
contentSnippet: A sharp drawdown has pushed BTC towards heavy put positioning at $80,000 ahead of Friday’s expiry.

title: Naver Financial to launch local stablecoin wallet amid Upbit merger: report
contentSnippet: The wallet service will allow users to exchange different fiat currencies into regional currency 'Dongbaek-jeon' in the form of a stablecoin.

title: Bitcoin Faces Short Squeeze Risk Above $87K as Funding Rates Hint Local Bottom
contentSnippet: Derivatives metrics show rising bearish positioning followed by a sharp reduction in open interest, while price recovery hints at early squeeze dynamics.

title: Private Equity Firm Bridgepoint to Buy Majority of Crypto Audit Specialist ht.digital
contentSnippet: Bridgepoint did not disclose the financial terms of the deal. Sky News cited a figure of 200 million pounds ($262 million).

title: Monad’s Debut Shows Why FDV Forecasts Broke as Bitcoin Fell
contentSnippet: Monad’s listing illustrates how low-float launches can anchor valuation even when macro conditions point in the opposite direction, leaving traders mispricing outcomes that hinge more on supply than o

title: Japan’s FSA to Mandate Liability Reserves for Crypto Exchanges to Enhance Security: Report
contentSnippet: Japan's Financial Services Agency is set to require digital asset exchanges to maintain liability reserves to protect users.

title: Spot Solana ETFs log 20 consecutive days of net inflows since debut
contentSnippet: One analyst said the inflows set the stage for Solana's potential price rebound once the broader de-risking in the crypto market settles.

title: KuCoin Registers With Austrac to Operate in Australia, Adds Fiat On-Ramps
contentSnippet: The registration comes as Australian regulators tighten scrutiny on offshore crypto platforms, with ASIC stating that many digital assets may require licensing to operate.

title: Binance ‘knowingly facilitated’ Hamas terrorist group, new lawsuit claims
contentSnippet: The lawsuit claims Binance knowingly facilitated Hamas to move funds before the militant group's 2023 attack on Israel.

title: DOGE Pops 5% as ETF Debut Sparks First Clear Reversal Signal in Weeks
contentSnippet: ETF analysts characterized the launch as another major inflection point for memecoin legitimacy, with early volume estimates near $11 million.

title: Japan's FSA to Require Crypto Exchanges Hold Liability Reserves for Losses Relating to Hacks
contentSnippet: Japan is seeking to restore trust in crypto markets after a decade of security failures, from Mt. Gox to the recent DMM Bitcoin hack.

title: Galaxy Digital explores Polymarket, Kalshi partnerships as liquidity provider: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: Polymarket and Kalshi are the two dominant prediction market platforms, which have seen around $42.4 billion in cumulative volume.

title: Bitcoin Rebounds Above $88K—Will It Last?
contentSnippet: Bitcoin's weekend bounce is being supported by orderly derisking, a drop in bearish options hedging, and steady institutional conviction.

title: Binance Faces Fresh Lawsuit Over Alleged Hamas Transactions
contentSnippet: A court filing claims Binance’s structure and controls let users tied to U.S.-designated terrorist groups move funds through its exchange.

title: Wallet provider Exodus acquires W3C for $175 million to expand crypto payments stack
contentSnippet: W3C Corp is the parent entity of Baanx and Monavate, which offer card and payments infrastructure services for fintech and crypto clients.

title: Musk Says Real-World Data From X and Tesla to Drive AGI Efforts
contentSnippet: SpaceX's CEO, Elon Musk, said Tesa’s fleet and X’s live data are providing him with training inputs that competitors lack.

title: Japan to tighten crypto exchange oversight with new reserve mandate: report
contentSnippet: The country currently requires exchanges to manage customers' crypto reserves in cold wallets, but does not require a reserve.

title: Bitcoin Heist: Family Members Waterboarded, Sexually Assaulted as Attackers Steal $1.6 Million
contentSnippet: Horrific details of a Bitcoin wrench attack in Canada were revealed, with victims held hostage, waterboarded, and sexually assaulted.

title: SEC Clears Fuse Energy Token in Win for US Crypto ‘Regulatory Clarity’
contentSnippet: The SEC has granted no-action relief to Fuse’s rewards token, saying its value stems from consumer use rather than investment potential.

title: Trump Signs 'Genesis Mission' Executive Order to Use AI to Supercharge US Innovation
contentSnippet: Trump's latest order aims to fuse federal data, supercomputing, and AI to speed discoveries across energy, biology, and national security.

title: Irreverent memecoin inspired by World Liberty founder rallies 130% after Trump-connected crypto project’s endorsement
contentSnippet: World Liberty, the crypto project linked to President Donald Trump’s family, said it would invest in the SPSC memecoin.

title: Bitcoin Giant Strategy Skips Bitcoin Buy With Stock Down 67% From Peak
contentSnippet: The Bitcoin-buying firm has a habit of announcing purchases on Monday.

title: XRP Jumps as Franklin Templeton Debuts Latest Crypto ETF
contentSnippet: The Franklin XRP fund comes less than two weeks after the successful start of a Canary Capital XRP ETF.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.

title: NFT markets rebound after $1.2B wipeout in Friday’s crypto crash
contentSnippet: Top Ethereum NFT collections like BAYC, Pudgy Penguins and CryptoPunks remain in the red despite a partial market recovery after Friday’s crypto market crash.

title: Sorare CEO still bullish on Ethereum despite ‘upgrading’ to Solana
contentSnippet: Fantasy sports crypto platform Sorare is migrating from Ethereum to Solana, with its CEO saying it is a better fit for Sorare due to its scalability and focus on consumer applications.
